scripts.check-line-endings: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const files=fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.ts')||f.endsWith('.tsx')||f.endsWith('.js')||f.endsWith('.jsx')||f.endsWith('.json')||f.endsWith('.css')||f.endsWith('.html'));const wrongLineEnding=files.filter(f=>{const content=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');return content.includes('\r\n')});if(wrongLineEnding.length>0){console.error('Files with CRLF line endings:',wrongLineEnding);process.exit(1);}else{console.log('All files have correct LF line endings.');}"
